column2: "I've met you before, but honestly, I think I'm just making ridiculous requests..."
"But after seeing the children whispering about it with sparkles in their eyes, I've got to prepare something for them!"
"I've got a really selfish request, but I think may you're the one who could grant it..."
"So this is my last request! We can meet at the cake shop! Buy me a Christmas cake!"
